mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT b.* FROM battle b LEFT JOIN game_fighter gf ON gf.battle_id = b.id where gf.user_id = #{userId} AND /** 比赛正在进行 */ b.game_status = 'ing' AND /** 用户未提交结果 */ gf.game_fighter_status = 'ing'

SELECT DISTINCT b.* FROM battle b LEFT JOIN game_fighter gf ON gf.battle_id = b.id WHERE gf.user_id = #{userId} AND /** 比赛已经结束的 */ (b.game_status = 'end' OR b.game_status = 'stop') ORDER BY b.id DESC LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id1 FROM ( SELECT * FROM (SELECT battle_id id1 FROM game_fighter WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND game_fighter_status = 'submit')a INNER JOIN (SELECT battle_id id2 FROM game_fighter WHERE user_id != #{userId} AND game_fighter_status = 'submit')b ON a.id1 = b.id2 )a INNER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM battle WHERE game_status = 'ing' )b ON a.id1 = b.id
